algorithmes
Interface Selectionneur

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSelectionneurQLambda, Gagnant, SelectionneurAleatoire, SelectionneurHumain, SelectionneurMemoire, SelectionneurNN, SelectionneurNNSingle, SelectionneurPeng, SelectionneurPengNN, SelectionneurQL, SelectionneurQLINT, SelectionneurTDFA, SelectionneurWatkins, SelectionneurWatkinsNN, SelectionneurWatkinsNNSingle
public interface Selectionneur
extends Serializable

All we ask an algorithm to be able to do is :

  • Extract an action chosen among the list of possible moves
  • Learn from its experience

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)

apprend

void apprend(State s1,
             State s2,
             double reward,
             Action a)
Learn

Parameters:
s1 - The state the agent is in before the action is performed.
s2 - The state the agent goes to when the action is performed.
reward - The reward obtained for this move.
a - The action the agent took.
